Content:: Kenichi Ōkuma (Japanese: 大熊謙一, Hepburn: Ōkuma Kenichi, 7 March 1966 – 22 July 2022),[1] also known as Kenichi Okuma, Kenichi Ohkuma, Kenichi Ookuma, or Ken-ichi Ookuma, was a Japanese video game music composer, sound designer and musician.
